IllusionRedcap.synopsis:
This occurs in the swamp. Sheep wander the area - except they're redcaps (a type of violent faerie) hidden by the hag's illusions. The creatures are pretending to be sheep. 
The illusion can be shattered by an animal handling check. OR if the player preciously succeeded in a perception check in the area.
IllusionRedcap.how_to_trigger: loadlevel WLD_Main_Agoto 16.329; 5.499; 248.268ignore feeling OR roll amazing in investigationspeak w sheep/redcap

Illusioncheck.synopsis: Dialogue covers the transition from the pretty illusion that is on the swamp to the fetid reality.Triggers when entering the area, or when the illusion is disrupted because of combat or because Ethel is dropping her disguise.This means it may play for a Wildshaped player or even a summon or follower.
Illusioncheck.how_to_trigger: In WLD_Main_A, go to the "riverside teahouse" waypoint.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: The two sessions both describe parts of the same swamp encounter but at different moments. In IllusionRedcap the player encounters the seemingly harmless flock of sheep – which are in reality violent redcaps hidden behind a hag’s illusion. This illusion can be broken (by an animal handling check or by a previously successful perception check), at which point the game transitions to an explanation of the true nature of the area. That explanation is provided in the Illusioncheck session, which covers the shifting from the pretty, deceptive appearance to the uglier, fetid reality. In other words, if a player witnesses and then disrupts the illusion presented in IllusionRedcap, the natural consequence is that the Illusioncheck dialogue is triggered. However, note that if the player has already succeeded on a perception check (or otherwise bypasses the illusion), then they may never see the IllusionRedcap scene before the transition dialogue; in that case, the sessions are mutually exclusive. Thus, there is an ordering constraint when the illusion is first encountered and then disrupted – IllusionRedcap precedes Illusioncheck – and also a conditional exclusiveness depending on how the illusion is handled.

IllusionRedcap_38.speaker: Narrator
IllusionRedcap_38.text: *Again? This creature doesn't realise you can see its true form.*

IllusionRedcap_9.speaker: Narrator
IllusionRedcap_9.text: *The sheep's voice warbles. You realise it's trying to say 'Baa'.*

IllusionRedcap_53.speaker: Player
IllusionRedcap_53.text: Tell me about this place, sheep.

IllusionRedcap_36.speaker: Redcap Blood Sage, Redcap, Redcap Blood Sage, 0446e7c4-3076-415c-aa7f-deb7f43e5d06, Redcap, a72e6051-d06b-469c-b6dc-4c962cfe307f

IllusionRedcap_30.speaker: Narrator
IllusionRedcap_30.text: *Curious. Despite your form, the creature doesn't understand you.*

IllusionRedcap_21.speaker: Narrator
IllusionRedcap_21.text: *Curious. Despite your magic, the creature doesn't understand you.*

IllusionRedcap_16.speaker: Player
IllusionRedcap_16.text: Drop your eyes and carefully reach out.

IllusionRedcap_19.speaker: Narrator
IllusionRedcap_19.text: *The smell of rot assaults your senses as the illusion vanishes.*
IllusionRedcap_19.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sheep illusion wavers and the creature transforms into a redcap

IllusionRedcap_35.speaker: Narrator
IllusionRedcap_35.text: *A diminutive creature sporting a red hat glares at you. He seems unaware that his illusion has failed.*
IllusionRedcap_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Redcap doesn't realize the jig is up, thinks you think he's still a sheep.

IllusionRedcap_32.speaker: Redcap Blood Sage, Redcap, Redcap Blood Sage, 0446e7c4-3076-415c-aa7f-deb7f43e5d06, Redcap, a72e6051-d06b-469c-b6dc-4c962cfe307f
IllusionRedcap_32.text: Nosy, scum-sucking, lice-ridden little ballbag. Get outs! Or I bites tongue. Eats tongue. Delicious tongue.
IllusionRedcap_32.context: NodeContext: Think Gollum - fragmented animal like speech - cruel and threatening

IllusionRedcap_1.speaker: Player
IllusionRedcap_1.text: All right! No need to get nasty.

IllusionRedcap_43.speaker: Redcap Blood Sage, Redcap, Redcap Blood Sage, 0446e7c4-3076-415c-aa7f-deb7f43e5d06, Redcap, a72e6051-d06b-469c-b6dc-4c962cfe307f
IllusionRedcap_43.text: Aw, precious baby. Loves to bleed you - yes. Turn your corpse into sponge. Lots of holes. Yes.
IllusionRedcap_43.context: NodeContext: Think Gollum - fragmented animal like speech - cruel and threatening

IllusionRedcap_27.speaker: Redcap Blood Sage, Redcap, Redcap Blood Sage, 0446e7c4-3076-415c-aa7f-deb7f43e5d06, Redcap, a72e6051-d06b-469c-b6dc-4c962cfe307f
IllusionRedcap_27.text: Leave. NOW. Or I fill you with holes. And more. HAHA.

IllusionRedcap_14.speaker: Redcap Blood Sage, Redcap, Redcap Blood Sage, 0446e7c4-3076-415c-aa7f-deb7f43e5d06, Redcap, a72e6051-d06b-469c-b6dc-4c962cfe307f
IllusionRedcap_14.text: Hah! I bleed you. Cut you. Make many delicious holes. Yes. YES.
IllusionRedcap_14.context: NodeContext: Think Gollum - fragmented animal like speech - cruel and threatening

IllusionRedcap_58.speaker: Player
IllusionRedcap_58.text: Take a deep breath and say 'BAA'.

Consider making this 'sheep noise' beneath you - animalistic and rage filled as you hiss out a 'Baaa'

IllusionRedcap_64.speaker: Redcap Blood Sage, Redcap, Redcap Blood Sage, 0446e7c4-3076-415c-aa7f-deb7f43e5d06, Redcap, a72e6051-d06b-469c-b6dc-4c962cfe307f
IllusionRedcap_64.text: Argh. Away. Or eats you. Bleeds you.
IllusionRedcap_64.context: NodeContext: Practically snarling - teeth bared leering at the player as you bark out the roughest approximation of a sheep

Illusioncheck_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: ~Ethel dramatically transforms into her true hag form.

Illusioncheck_12.speaker: Narrator
Illusioncheck_12.text: *You blink and the wilderness changes. A swamp, stinking and insidious, assaults your senses.*
Illusioncheck_12.context: InternalNodeContext: Variant without showing player character

Illusioncheck_16.speaker: Narrator
Illusioncheck_16.text: *A chill runs up your spine. You feel like you're being watched.*
Illusioncheck_16.context: CinematicNodeContext: Players is shapeshifted - don't show player.

Illusioncheck_19.speaker: Narrator
Illusioncheck_19.text: *A chill runs up your spine. You feel like you're being watched.*

Illusioncheck_7.text: Look for anything out of the ordinary.

Illusioncheck_21.speaker: Narrator
Illusioncheck_21.text: *You blink and the wilderness changes. A swamp, stinking and insidious, assaults your senses.*

Illusioncheck_8.speaker: Narrator
Illusioncheck_8.text: *The place has a quiet sense of calm. You can't see anything strange.*

Illusioncheck_22.text: Search for any disruption in the Weave.

Illusioncheck_18.text: Carefully probe with your magic. Is the disturbance around you, or within you?

Illusioncheck_4.text: Looks for signs of unnatural activity.

Illusioncheck_9.text: Reach out with your senses - check the balance of this place.

Illusioncheck_14.text: Tap into the preternatural awareness granted by your oath. Seek the truth.
